__html:
The fifth Dubbo meetup has been held in Hangzhou

The fifth Dubbo meetup has been held in Hangzhou,

Please enjoy the slides of the topics:

  • Ding Li: How to involve in dubbo community slides
  • Shenli Cao: Dubbo 2.7 introduction slides
  • Tao Yang: Dubbo practice in netease koala slides
  • Mercy Ma: Nacos support in Dubbo slides
  • Yihao Zhao: Sentinel: Sentinel support for Dubbo slides
  • Zhixuan Chen: Troubleshooting Dubbo with Arthas slides
